headline: Border Protection System Global Analysis Report 2025 | Market to Surpass $40 Billion by 2029, Driven by Trends in Biometrics, Smart Borders, and Advanced Surveillance - Long-term Forecast to 2034
summary: The border protection system market is forecasted to grow from $28.79 billion in 2024 to $40.05 billion by 2029 at a CAGR of 6.9%. Factors driving this growth include rising geopolitical tensions, security threats, and demand for automated border systems.
